description: Specify the default version of an extension. The default version of an extension will be used in CloudFormation operations.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension for which you want version summary information. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The kind of extension. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description: The name of the extension. Conditional: You must specify either TypeName and Type, or Arn.
